entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saskatoon Diefenbaker Int'l Airport 07:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

Temperature: -13.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 89 %

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
